about_the_game:
Castle Explorer Heroes and rings - The magical board game for 1 to 8 players.


Heroes and rings is an expansion for Castle Explorer with new magical rings and heroes with special abilities.

9 new Heroes ready to confronts the dark castle

  • Play as Urafeus a mystical wizard who uses magic spells to twist the maze and defeats his foes.
  • Play as Dwyght a sneaky thief who easily detect secrets in the castle.
  • Play as Dazzaxath a mighty Chaos warrior who uses dark power to survive.
  • Play as Romulus a fast scout who travel around with ease.
  • Play as Gretnas a strong gladiator with no fear from foes or traps.
  • Play as Maleriona a mystical dragon princess who uses her dragon to protect herself.
  • Play as Kobberknight a warrior with a magical spear and trustworthy cat pet.
  • Play as Gruddaes a dwarf with anger issues ready to smash everything.
  • Play as Stillstreak a Ninja with a dozen weapons to kill every living being.

4 new mystical rings

  • Ring of transformation with the power to change a room to your desire.
  • Ring of luck with the power to change an event to your favour.
  • Ring of teleport with the power to escape from dark below.
  • Ring of Vision with the power to easily find what you seek in a room.

Lots of new heroes and playstyles to challenge the castle once more...

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel Pentium 4 or AMD Athlon 64
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1920 x 1080 resolution
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 600 MB available space

short_description: Heroes and rings is an expansion for Castle Explorer with new magical rings and 9 new playable heroes with special abilities to help defeat the game.
